review: I love the concept, but it does not show a good picture.  I am use to HD

review: Nothing but problems with this product since day one. Connection is shotty at best - programs freeze, constantly buffer for long periods of time, and Spotify has pretty much stopped working all together. I'm sending this back and getting Chromecast.
